verse_part: and that you may be king
and he has sent him away,
and according to Your own heart,
and let us show ourselves courageous
in order to raise him up
As soon as he had finished
that we may put him to death
is as one who is guilty,
let him put me to death.”
and I would give him justice.”
then He will bring me back again
as he was about to cross
did you treat us with contempt?
of those who had been hanged.
who is worthy to be praised,
those who rose up against me.
those who rise up against me;
I will give thanks to You,
So when they had gone about
